HUMAN-CENTRIC AI: FROM PRINCIPLES TO ACTIONABLE AND SHARED POLICIES

AI is increasingly being used to support human decision-making. To achieve trust in the whole AI ecosystem, we recommend an ethics-by-design methodology for G20 Governments, harmonised and supported by a multi-national approach.

Key Concepts:

  • Autonomy of Human Beings
  • Fundamental Vulnerability
  • Common Good
  • strategic planning
  • state-level implementation
  • transparency and fairness
  • critical system problems
  • shared policies
